subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Germany suffered a setback when captain Michael Ballack was ruled out of the opening game against Costa Rica.  The game between Germany and Costa Rica in Munich is the first of 64 World Cup matches.
snippet: Germany suffered a setback when captain Michael Ballack was ruled out of the opening game against Costa Rica.  The game between Germany and Costa Rica in Munich is the first of 64 World Cup matches.
